abstract: Autonomous Research, a London-based boutique research firm, has hired Guy Moszkowski from Bank of America Merrill Lynch as the chief executive of its United States operations.
snippet: Autonomous Research, a London-based boutique research firm, has hired Guy Moszkowski from Bank of America Merrill Lynch as the chief executive of its United States operations.
lead_paragraph: Autonomous Research, a London-based boutique research firm, has decided to expand in the United States in a big way — by hiring one of the top banking analysts around.

headline.main: Bank of America’s Moszkowski to Join a Research Boutique

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
